username.selector: body > div:nth-child(5) > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td:nth-child(2) > input[type="text"]

password.selector: body > div:nth-child(5) > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(3) > td:nth-child(2) > input[type="password"]

submit.selector: body > div:nth-child(5) > form > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(6) > td > input
